price: Tàbí ìwọ ń rò pé dájúdájú ọ̀pọ̀lọ́pọ̀ wọn ń gbọ́ràn tàbí pé wọ́n ń ṣe làákàyè? Kí ni wọ́n ná, bí kò ṣe bí àgùtàn. Rárá, wọ́n ṣìnà jùlọ.
arabic: أَمۡ تَحۡسَبُ أَنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ يَسۡمَعُونَ أَوۡ يَعۡقِلُونَۚ إِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا كَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ بَلۡ هُمۡ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: am taḥsabu anna aktharahum yasmaʿūna aw yaʿqilūna in hum illā kal-anʿāmi bal hum aḍallu sabīlan
